name: MetadataResource.version
title: MetadataResource.version
purpose: Data Elements are defined for each element to assist in questionnaire construction etc

element.short: Business version of the metadata resource
element.definition: The identifier that is used to identify this version of the metadata resource when it is referenced in a specification, model, design or instance. This is an arbitrary value managed by the metadata resource author and is not expected to be globally unique. For example, it might be a timestamp (e.g. yyyymmdd) if a managed version is not available. There is also no expectation that versions can be placed in a lexicographical sequence.
element.comment: There may be different metadata resource instances that have the same identifier but different versions.  The version can be appended to the url in a reference to allow a reference to a particular business version of the metadata resource with the format [url]|[version].
